content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP):Islamabad Electric Supply Company (IESCO) on Monday issued a power suspension programme for Tuesday for various areas of its region due to necessary maintenance and routine development work. According to IESCO Spokesperson, the power supply of different feeders and grid stations would remain suspended for the period from 07:00 AM to 11:00 AM, Islamabad Circle, Scheme.II, Kand Rajgan, King Hamid University, CST, Flour Mill, Industrial.II Feeders, Rawalpindi City Circle, HPT, Amir Hamza, Officer Colony, I-14/2, I-14/3, Lakho Road, Pindhon, Ghousia Colony, Saidpur Road, Hyderi Chowk, Range Road, Saham, Chakra Feeders, Rawalpindi Cantt Circle, Bisali, Jhatta Hathial, New Kaliam, Bhal, Murat, Khasala, Jarar Camp, Fatima Jinnah Feeders, Jhelum Circle, Jeddah, F-9 Chak Daulat Feeders, Chakwal Circle, Mureed, Darya Jalap and surrounding areas.
